alert.label: BNRA SQL Injection Alert
alert.description: Real-time alert for detecting SQL Injection attacks in the BNRA system

search.query: index=bnra sourcetype=bnra_attack_logs (sql_injection OR "sql injection" OR "UNION SELECT" OR "UNION ALL")

email.subject: BNRA SQL Injection Alert: <$alert.message>
email.body:
A SQL Injection attack has been detected in the BNRA system: <$alert.message>.
Details: <$alert.summary>.
Timestamp: <$alert.time>.
Please investigate immediately.
